abstract: A Dealbreaker blind item about an unnamed Wall Street chief has people guessing: Which bank head thinks the Treasury secretary is “helpless?”
snippet: A Dealbreaker blind item about an unnamed Wall Street chief has people guessing: Which bank head thinks the Treasury secretary is “helpless?”
lead_paragraph: It doesn’t take an in-depth investigation to figure out that many top Wall Street executives aren’t too pleased with the Obama administration. But who’d be so bold as to venture their opinion semi-publicly?

headline.main: Who’s the Unnamed and Frustrated Wall St. Chief?
